overview.overview: Ghost is the world's most popular open source headless Node.js CMS for professional publishing.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Ghost with professional support for your business. Ghost is the world's most popular open source headless Node.js CMS for professional publishing. It makes it simple to publish content online, grow an audience with email newsletters. Ghost is developed with Node.js. With front-end and back-end completely separated.
